amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds appropriated by this Act from being used to implement the administrations climate change Executive orders.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prevents funds appropriated by this Act from being used to implement the Administration's executive orders relating to climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 213 (Roll no. 492).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 213 (Roll no. 492).
